title: Postharvest quality and ripening behaviour of un-explored genotypes of Himalayan plain mango diversity
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Killi Prasad, Neetu Saroj, Sanjay Kumar Singh, Jyostnarani Pradhan, Shiv Shankar Prasad, Sunil Kumar, Shubham Maurya, Alok Kumar, Rajeev Kumar Srivastava, Rahul Kumar Tiwari, Milan Kumar Lal, Bhagya Vijayan, Ankit Kumar, Ipsita Samal, Upagya Shah, Ravinder Kumar
